summary.para: The IF_COUNTED_STRING structure specifies a counted string for NDIS interfaces.

remarks.para: The IF_COUNTED_STRING structure is the data type for various NDIS string structures, such as NDIS_IF_COUNTED_STRING.
If the string is NULL-terminated, the Length member must not include the terminating NULL character.

summary.para: A USHORT value that contains the length, in bytes, of the string.
A WCHAR buffer that contains the string. The string does not need to be null-terminated.
